label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_023
content:
## 2024-08-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 96
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 65
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 11

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 34
- Standard: 36
- Placebo: 37

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.6
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 28.5
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.5
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 371.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 31.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 28.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 2.9
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.5

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.9
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.3
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.1
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 319.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 35.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 23.9
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.6

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 48.5
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.6
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 268.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 40.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.3
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.6
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.2

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 218
- Sessions Attended: 180
- Attendance Rate (%): 93.0

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.7
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.4
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.8
- WBC (k) SD: 1.6
- Platelets (k) Mean: 242
- Platelets (k) SD: 41
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.82
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.17
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 92.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2393, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2390, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2396, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2329, Description: Grip strength dynamometer calibration overdue by 3 days, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: PM-PD-2348, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 90%
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 23 sites

### Notes
- Week 23: Pain management assessments on track. 107 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
